review: Have a dumb TV?  Turn it into a smart TV with this AMAZING adapter.  I have 2 including one on a smart TV that acts stupid often.  This thing just works and has TONS of support.THE ONLY thing currently wrong with the software is hotel support.  There is no way to get past the splash screen at most hotels to log in.  Considering how small this thing is, it is great to take on travel, but without being able to sign into the hotel WIFI, this because just a paper weight.

review: Chromecast is a perfect choice for someone who has an HDTV who just wants to watch youtube or netflix in their living room (or whereever else)If you have a smart TV, or a game console (xbox one, ps4, etc.) this is probably not the best choice.I experienced a handful of issues, but that's to be expected from such a small wireless device.

review: If you already have a Prime Membership, this purchase is a no-brainer! Pretty much plug and play. It is so easy to use that my 2 1/2 year old can almost operate by herself.  What a great value as a companion to your Prime Membership.  Also very convenient to stream directly to your tv.  My daughter loves the ability to watch her favorite shows on the big screen on demand!
